Sentencas: The present work investigates the effects of the temperature and thermal stress distributions in a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit cell.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A computational fluid dynamic (CFD) analysis of a planar anode-supported SOFC that considers electrochemical reactions is performed, and the thermal stresses are calculated.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The static friction coefficients are assumed to range from 0.05 to 0.3, and conservatively, a perfectly bonded condition is assumed.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that the electrolyte is the weakest component and has the maximum stress because the electrolyte is the thinnest and the Young modulus is the highest.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Thus, the contact between the anode electrode and the electrolyte, and between the cathode electrode and the electrolyte, would be the perfectly bonded condition.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: As a result, this research showed that the stresses induced by constraint forces with various contact conditions were dominant for the structural stability in a SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Therefore, static friction coefficients on operative high temperature conditions are important to predict the structural integrity in a SOFC, and they will be investigated in future works in order to improve the structural stability in a stack design as well as in a SOFC.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of flow/heat transfer and structural stress in a planar solid oxide fuel cell
